primitiveView.SQLQuery: SELECT f.publisher_id AS publisher_id, f.human_id AS human_id FROM book_db.foundedBy f
SELECT h.city_id AS city_id, h.book_id AS book_id FROM book_db.hasCityLocation h
SELEC FROM book_db.FictionalNotHuman f
SELECT h.mayor_id AS mayor_id, h.realcity_id AS realcity_id FROM book_db.hasMayor h
SELECT h.author_genre_id AS author_genre_id, h.author_id AS author_id FROM book_db.hasAuthor_Genre h
SELECT l.num_speakers AS num_speakers, l.language_label AS language_label, l.language_id AS language_id, l.language_description AS language_description FROM book_db.Language l
SELECT h.edition_id AS edition_id, h.book_id AS book_id FROM book_db.hasEdition h
SELECT e.edition_id AS edition_id, e.edition_label AS edition_label, e.edition_description AS edition_description FROM book_db.Edition e
SELECT a.author_label AS author_label, a.author_description AS author_description FROM book_db.Author a

SELECT h.award_id AS award_id, h.author_id AS author_id FROM book_db.hasAward h
SELECT t.translator_label AS translator_label, t.translator_description AS translator_description FROM book_db.Translator t
SELEC FROM book_db.FictionalHuman f
SELECT b.book_description AS book_description, b.book_label AS book_label, b.book_id AS book_id, b.title AS title, b.subtitle AS subtitle FROM book_db.Book b

primitiveView.SQLQuery: SELECT h.sex AS sex, h.name AS name, h.human_description AS human_description, h.human_id AS human_id, h.DoD AS DoD, h.human_label AS human_label, h.DoB AS DoB FROM book_db.Human h
SELECT h.character_id AS character_id, h.book_id AS book_id FROM book_db.hasCharacter h
SELECT l.publisher_id AS publisher_id, l.country_id AS country_id FROM book_db.locatedIn l
SELEC FROM book_db.FictionalCity f
SELECT h.language_id AS language_id, h.country_id AS country_id FROM book_db.hasUsedLanguage h
SELECT r.area AS area, r.population AS population FROM book_db.RealCity r
SELECT a.award_id AS award_id FROM book_db.Award a
SELECT h.edition_id AS edition_id, h.publisher_id AS publisher_id FROM book_db.hasPublisher h
SELECT h.book_id AS book_id, h.author_id AS author_id FROM book_db.hasAuthor h
SELECT c.country_description AS country_description, c.country_label AS country_label, c.country_id AS country_id FROM book_db.Country c
SELECT p.inception AS inception, p.publisher_description AS publisher_description, p.publisher_id AS publisher_id, p.publisher_label AS publisher_label FROM book_db.Publisher p
SELECT h.mayor_id AS mayor_id, h.human_id AS human_id FROM book_db.hasRole h
SELECT h.book_id AS book_id, h.author_id AS author_id FROM book_db.hasAfterwordAuthor h
SELECT c.city_id AS city_id, c.city_description AS city_description, c.city_label AS city_label FROM book_db.City c
SELEC FROM book_db.FictionalCharacter f
SELECT p.realcity_id AS realcity_id, p.human_id AS human_id FROM book_db.PlaceOfDeath p
SELECT f.book_id AS book_id FROM book_db.followedBy f
SELECT p.realcity_id AS realcity_id, p.human_id AS human_id FROM book_db.PlaceOfBirth p
SELECT h.edition_id AS edition_id, h.translator_id AS translator_id FROM book_db.hasTranslator h
SELECT h.realcity_id AS realcity_id, h.country_id AS country_id FROM book_db.hasCountry h
SELECT h.book_id AS book_id, h.country_id AS country_id FROM book_db.hasCountryLocation h
SELECT a.author_genre_id AS author_genre_id FROM book_db.Author_Genre a
SELECT i.author_id AS author_id FROM book_db.InfluencedBy i
SELECT h.edition_id AS edition_id, h.human_id AS human_id FROM book_db.hasIllustrator h
SELECT h.fictionalcity_id AS fictionalcity_id, h.realcity_id AS realcity_id FROM book_db.hasAnalog h
